name: Kan Colle Kai
description:
Kan Colle Kai is a strategy game developed by Kadokawa Games. It was originally released in 2016. It was published by Kadokawa Shoten.
Kan Colle Kai is available on PS Vita.
Kensuke Tanaka, Michio Okamiya and Yoshimi Yasuda produced the game. It was directed by Kensuke Tanaka. Hiroshi Usami, Kaori Ōkoshi and Michio Okamiya scored the game.
